entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Wet snow changing to periods of snow this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 before morning. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
